comments:

open java perspective, create a plugin project, enter name as testPlugin
select the folder named icons and choose Go Into, so that view only reveals
sample.gif.
switch to resource perspective and delete the project completely.
switch to java perspective and you still see sample.gif. 
double click on it and get error.

Erich can you please investigate. I think that the delta listener doesn't 
cover the case that a parent gets deleted.

fixed by adding a refresh when the input gets deleted.
however, in this state the viewer is not useable any more.
files a separate bug on this problem for post 3.0
Verified by Danny Dig. No more zombies left over.
